title: Spacious Gut Renovated 3-Bed Apartment near Jackie Robinson Park
map_address: Broadway near Amsterdam Avenue and Broadway
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 236180685', 'Rent: $3,500 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', '- Hardwood Floors', '- In-unit Washer & Dryer', '- Dishwasher', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Granite Countertops', 'Areas of Interest: City College, Columbia University, Columbia Medical Center, Harlem Public, Riverbank State Park, Hudson River.', 'Hamilton Heights is beautiful, wedged between the Hudson River to the west and St. Nicholas Park to the east, this is a neighborhood of hilly parks, museums and beautiful old brownstones.', "Walking distance to City College, easily access Columbia University or Columbia Medical Center and don't forget to take advantage of Riverside State Park with it's state of the athletic facilities while you're at it!", 'FEATURES', 'Elevator', 'Live In Super']
